text: Skargel the Miner

Embark on a daring quest for Burlok Damminsson as you delve into the ancient Ruins of the corners of the world. There, gather the elusive Serpent Fang and Moon Orchid required for his groundbreaking arcane experiment. Success will undoubtedly catch the attention of the renowned adventurer Skargel the Miner, known for seeking out those who push the boundaries of science and magic. The fate of both Dwarfkind and the annals of legendary achievements awaits your capable hands!
Thulgrim the Thief

Embark on a clandestine mission for Burlok Damminsson to the farthest corners of the known world, where the Sunfire Crystals and Calithian Starbloom can be found. Secure these elusive ingredients for Damminsson's secretive experiment in the ancient arts. Success will surely draw the attention of Thulgrim the Thief, a shadowy figure renowned for seeking out those who tread the fine line between innovation and thievery. Unravel the mysteries that lie in the shadows and claim your place among legends!
Shaz Ensun

Undertake a mystic quest on behalf of Burlok Damminsson, seeking the elusive Khureshi Sand Opal and Aqua-Mirage Pearls from the remote Astral Sanctums. These radiant gems are crucial for enigmatic experiments in harnessing celestial energies. As the cosmic forces align, your success will undoubtedly capture the attention of Shaz Ensun, the wandering adventurer drawn to the very fabric of the cosmos. Seize the opportunity to become part of a tale whispered among the stars!
Ethereal Fusion

Embark on a quest to the heart of the mystical Sylvan Glades and the imperial Dragon Sanctuaries. Gather the elusive Sylvan Glintleaf and Imperial Dragonroot, essential components for Burlok Damminsson's groundbreaking experiment, the "Ethereal Fusion." The stage is set for your journey into the realms of magical synthesis!
Elixier of the Morning Calm

Embark on a quest to harvest the rare Amanita Caesareoides from the enchanted glades of Sinhadaeng, and seek out the elusive Ebonshade Bamboo Shoot hidden deep within the shadowy bamboo groves of Doom Crag. With these exotic ingredients in hand, craft the potent "Elixir of the Morning Calm" for Burlok Damminsson's alchemical experiment. The alchemy of nature awaits your skilled hands as you blend the essence of the dawn into a mystical elixir of untold power.
Shimmering Leviathan Amulet

Embark on a daring expedition to the uncharted depths of the ocean near Seagrave Port to secure the precious Leviathan Blubber, and navigate the forests of Avags Aerie to harvest their elusive essence. These mystical components are the key to forging the legendary "Shimmering Leviathan Amulet" for Burlok Damminsson's extraordinary experiment. Merge the essence of the abyss with the radiant glow of the Shimmerthorn, creating an artifact of unparalleled enchantment and aquatic allure.
Inferno Frostplate

Embark on a perilous journey to the heart of the Chaotic Volcanic Realms  near Khazags Khural to extract the scorching Chaosfire Emberstone, and traverse the icy depths of Tokmar Encampment to mine the rare Frostforged Ironclad Ore. With these volatile elements in your possession, forge the legendary "Inferno Frostplate" for Burlok Damminsson's groundbreaking experiment. Channel the opposing forces of fire and frost into a formidable armor, creating a fusion that defies the elemental boundaries and grants its wearer unparalleled protection in the face of adversity.
Magmaforged Granite Gauntlets

Embark on a quest to the heart of the molten depths of The Volary, braving the fiery abyss to obtain the rare Magmaforged Obsidian Shard. Journey to the ancient Karakite Granite quarries in the Karak Azorn, extracting the resilient stone with precision. Combine these formidable elements to craft the legendary "Magmaforged Granite Gauntlets" for Burlok Damminsson's groundbreaking experiment. Through the fusion of obsidian's infernal essence and the sturdiness of Karakite Granite, forge gauntlets that embody the resilience of the earth tempered by the fires of the underworld.
Famed Connaisseur
Unparalled when it comes to taste, it is said Dolmancé has the best tongue of the Old World - being able to recognize any and every taste from a mere sip of a whine or any beverage.
Far Away Kingdom
Sceolan is having a feud with the local High Elves. He will join you if you help him
The Hidden Sanctuary of Nippon
In the shadowed heart of the Nippo's dense forests, a lone knight, haunted by the past, seeks refuge from the relentless pursuit of Lord Slaurith and his Khornate warband.
Seeking Solace in the Temple of Gilgadresh
Deep within the ancient Temple of Gilgadresh, a knight takes refuge, his faith tested, while Lord Slaurith's wrath echoes throughout the distant lands of Ind.
Harboring the Fugitive: Gates of Calith

Within the bustling Gates of Calith, a knight from distant lands finds sanctuary, his identity concealed amid the city's thriving trade and high elven splendor, evading the relentless pursuit of Lord Slaurith.
Island of Secrets: Tor Elithis Refuge
On the tranquil shores of a small island near Tor Elithis, a lone knight hides in the island's obscurity, a brief respite from Lord Slaurith's ceaseless hunt.
Lord Slaurith's Pursuit: The Final Stand
Captured by a motley alliance of Dark Elf and Norscan raiders, the beleaguered knight awaits a grim fate, with Lord Slaurith's personal vendetta driving him to deliver the final blow.
Alliance of Hope: Wood Elves and Lizardmen
Aided by unlikely allies, Wood Elves and Lizardmen, the embattled knight makes his stand against the vengeful Lord Slaurith and his dark forces, in a last, desperate bid for survival.
Knight's Peril: Beastmen and Greenskin Ambush
In the clutches of Beastmen and Greenskins, the besieged knight awaits his doom, as Lord Slaurith hungers for the personal satisfaction of delivering the killing blow.
Realms United: Bretonnia and Empire's Rescue
With support from Bretonnia and the Empire, the valiant knight stands defiant against the encroaching forces of Lord Slaurith, as a united front of human realms battles for his salvation.
Harbringer of Tor Elithis's Doom

The conquest of Tor Elithis stands as a colossal responsibility, and Duriath Helbane sails forth, a shadow cast upon the seas, vowing not to disappoint the Witch King and to plunge the distant abyss into the grip of Naggaroth's dark dominion.
Jarl Olaf
Thorgar is aided by Jarl Olaf, a fearsome Khazag who follows Thorgar wherever he goes. It is he who keeps the marauders in check, and it is he who was vital in Thorgar's many feats.
Decay's Discipline

Orghotts Daemonspew, Nurgle's unwavering champion, commands a ceaseless purging in the Garden of Filth. Unworthy daemons and misguided followers disrupt the sacred cycle of decay. Stand with Orghotts in the Plague's Purge - delve into the pestilent realm, confront the impure, and restore Nurgle's garden to its true essence. Navigate treacherous terrain, for in this cleansing, the sanctity of decay shall be upheld.\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]Nurgle's Garden needs constant cleansing, Orghotts may face the wrathful spoils of decay repeteadly.[[/col]]
Parchment & Ink

Parchment has been seen falling from the skies over nearby battlefields. The scribblings upon them bind powerful magics into the pages, waiting to be unlocked by any who might claim them. Where they came from or why they litter the fields of war remains a mystery, yet one thing is for certain: every word brims with the Changer's arcane power. If the culprits behind this flurry of spells are ever to be located, questions must be asked. Perhaps those captured in battle may have tales to tell us?
{{tr:missions_localised_title_wh3_dlc24_mis_tze_blue_scribes_stage_1}}
{{tr:missions_localised_description_wh3_dlc24_mis_tze_blue_scribes_stage_2_changeling}}
Parchment & Ink

Your investigation has proven fruitful, indeed. It seems the Blue Scribes of Tzeentch – P'tarix and Xirat'p – are the frenzied force behind the haphazard magics that have plagued so many battlefields across the land. Better yet, a clue to their current location has now reared its head, as Chaos surges within a nearby settlement. If you act quickly, you could capture the region before the Blue Scribes have chance to move on, spreading their twisted mischief further outside of your reach.
Parchment & Ink

A Tale of the True Path

Word has spread of a noble’s son, a once-great Knight of the Empire, who roams the Chaos Wastes in search of a greater purpose. Most remarkably he bears the insignia of a Tzeentchian cult, the Brethren of the Golden Eagle. His loyalties had him pursued doggedly for a time by the Templars of Sigmar, the Empire’s Witch Hunters, but once they caught up he proved his status as the greatest swordsman in his Knightly Order. Perhaps in time this Champion-in-the-making will make his way to us, but in the meantime we must ensure there are more like-minded warriors to help him embrace Chaos.
Wundal the Wizard

A Dwarf claiming mastery of magic seeks to join our cause under Burlok Damminson's banner. However, he demands proof of his prowess through four experiments. Success will secure his allegiance to our hold. Proceed with caution and determination.
Complete 4 Experiments
